subject: College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Tom Penders, who has led four different teams to the N.C.A.A. tournament, earned Houston its first berth since 1992, and he still might lose his job.
snippet: Tom Penders, who has led four different teams to the N.C.A.A. tournament, earned Houston its first berth since 1992, and he still might lose his job.
